title: S3 EP1: Ghosts!
description:
HOORAY! It's Season Three time! Now we're cooking! In this episode, Maggie & Tim talk about Season Three Episode One: Ghosts! The episode where Shawn must find a way to keep Gus solving crimes with him and play referee to Henry and his recently returned mother.

Sponsors:
